pages.text: I don't understand, I thought I was doing everything right? Why is the temperature still raising? Why haven't I seen any wild animals recently, they were here just months ago? $(br2)What is going on? Sure, I have probably burned some fossil fuels to get my factory farm running, but far less than I could have. I have farmed a lot of animals.

I've fed them a massive amount of feed. I've dumped many tons of their waste into the rivers. I cleared many hectares of forest to make room for them. $(br2)I can't fathom how this could have caused these problems. How could all this add up to cancel my efforts to avoid fossil fuels? I feel confused and a mounting sense of hopelessness.
